name: Pieni Saari
description:
Short adventure puzzle game made in 72 hours for LD38

Explore five distinct islands, beat up the locals and take their treasure. Featuring classic characters like Green Apple, Chicken God and That One Red Goblin.

Game by https://twitter.com/Demulderjasper
Music by https://twitter.com/MrJoshuaMcLean

Note: all resolutions are supported, however UI scales best on 800x600.
